job.title: Principal Data Scientist
job.description: strongstrongAt Shipt we are transforming the grocery shopping experience and giving time back to consumers Shipt shoppers handpick fresh groceries and household essentials then deliver them to your door in as little as one hourstrongstrongstrongstrongstrongAt Shipt we are transforming the grocery shopping experience and giving time back to consumers Shipt shoppers handpick fresh groceries and household essentials then deliver them to your door in as little as one hourbrstrongstrongstrongstrong We work at the intersection of a multisided marketplace with crossdisciplinary teams shipping realworld products to our customers shoppers and partners around the nation We have rich complex datasets and our Data Science organization performs a wide variety of data science and analytics ranging from designing and evaluating experiments conducting research crafting complex database queries and ETL pipelines developing predictive models building marketplace optimization algorithms and informing decision making through insights and reporting brbrstrongstrong Were searching for a Senior Data Scientist Optimization Analytics to further boost the rigor of our statistical and data analysis approaches This person will help understand data collected across this complex marketplace optimize existing processes and make predictions to improve our products and experiences Our ideal candidate will be datadriven intellectually curious technically and statistically rigorous and a clear communicator brbrstrongstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongullistrong Bring strong technical expertise and develop a thorough understanding of our data to drive insights in the areas of customer behavior loyalty and engagement search performance profitability and product development through optimization techniques stronglilistrong Drive innovation explore and validate novel optimization methodologies and techniques stronglilistrong Collaborate with other members of the Data Science teams and partners on ways to approach optimization develop and apply techniques that deliver highest accuracy and quality analyses and insight with a focus on generating actionable insights balancing advanced solutions with interpretable results stronglilistrong Design optimization strategies to support business initiatives apply rigorous statistical analyses and interpret the results to improve performance work with engineeringproduct to deploy and drive real impact stronglilistrong Contribute to the data science roadmap and priorities within your area of ownership and projects stronglilistrong Find opportunities for improvement across the business and assist in decisionmaking across teams brbrstrongliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongullistrong Advanced degree in a quantitative field math statistics econometrics computer science or other and a minimum of 4 years of industry experience stronglilistrong Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics modeling and analytics stronglilistrong Experience with exploratory data analysis model development and knowledge of how to leverage these skills to solve complex business problems stronglilistrong Proven track record of completing multiple data science projects endtoend from idea generation objectives formulation to implementation and deliverables stronglilistrong Strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to explain technical topics to data scientists engineers and business partners stronglilistrong Strong SQL skills we use Snowflake Postgres and Redshift stronglilistrong Experience with a statistical scripting language eg R or Python stronglilistrong Experience with a data visualization tool Tableau Chartio Looker Spotfire Power BI etc stronglilistrong Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic teambased environment stronglilistrong Demonstrated ability to learn and embrace new technologies applications and solutions stronglilistrong Experience as a technical lead and passion for mentoring stronglilistrong Experience with event instrumentation is a plus brstrongliulemWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusbrbrememPursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsem
